Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالثِّقَةَ بِنَفْسِكَ فَإِنَّ ذَلِكَ مِنْ أَكْبَرِ مَصَايِدِ الشَّيْطَانِ

enWisdom: The worst choice is being satisfied with deficiency
The worst thing is being pleased with oneself

Wisdom: كُنْ أَوْثَقَ مَا تَكُونُ بِنَفْسِكَ أَحْذَرَ مَا تَكُونُ مِنْ خِدَاعِهَا
enWisdom: At the time when you are most confident in your soul be equally cautious (or fearful) of its deception
Whoever praises his soul, slays it

Wisdom: هَلَكَ مَنْ رَضِيَ عَنْ نَفْسِهِ وَوَثِقَ بِمَا تُسَوِّلُهُ لَهُ
enWisdom: The one who is pleased with himself and relies on that which his soul has made decorous for him, is destroyed
